mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board(board_name, board_address, board_price, board_content, board_notice,board_time, board_date, board_category, image_name, admin_num, business_user_num) VALUES(#{boardName},#{boardAddress},#{boardPrice},#{boardContent},#{boardNotice},#{boardTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{boardCategory},#{imageName},#{adminNum}, #{businessUserNum})
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, image_name,board_name,board_address ,board_category,business_user_num FROM tbl_board order by board_date desc

select board_num, board_name, board_address, board_price, board_content, board_notice, board_time, board_date, board_category, image_name, business_user_num from tbl_board where board_num = #{boardNum}
